faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about LinkMAX

q1.question: What is LinkMAX and what is it for?
q1.answer: LinkMAX is an AI-powered link-in-bio page builder that lets you create a mini-website in 2 minutes. Perfect for experts, freelancers, and businesses to combine all links, social media, and contact info in one place.

q2.question: How much does LinkMAX cost?
q2.answer: The Basic plan is free forever and includes unlimited links, basic blocks, and 3 AI requests per day. Premium plans start at $3.15/month with annual billing.

q3.question: How does AI page generation work?
q3.answer: During registration, you choose your niche (barber, photographer, trainer, etc.), and AI automatically creates a ready page with profile, needed blocks, and texts adapted to your profession.

q4.question: Can I use my own domain?
q4.answer: Yes, the Business plan allows you to connect your own domain with an SSL certificate. On free and Pro plans, your page is available at lnkmx.my/your-name.

q5.question: How do I accept payments through my page?
q5.answer: The Business plan includes Stripe and Kaspi Pay integration. You can sell products, services, and digital products directly from your page.

q6.question: Is there a mobile editor?
q6.answer: Yes! LinkMAX is built mobile-first. You can fully edit your page from your smartphone.

q7.question: What blocks are available?
q7.answer: 20+ block types are available: profile, links, buttons, images, video, carousels, products, price lists, forms, maps, messengers, testimonials, timers, and more.

q8.question: Is there analytics and CRM?
q8.answer: Yes, LinkMAX includes built-in view and click analytics. Pro plan offers mini-CRM for up to 100 leads/month, and Business has full CRM without limits.

q9.question: Can I install Meta, TikTok, Google pixels?
q9.answer: Yes, Pro and Business plans allow you to add pixels for retargeting and conversion tracking: Meta Pixel, TikTok Pixel, Google Analytics and more.

q10.question: What integrations does LinkMAX support?
q10.answer: LinkMAX integrates with Telegram for notifications, Stripe and Kaspi Pay for payments, Google Calendar for bookings. All social networks and messengers are supported.

q11.question: Does LinkMAX take commission from sales?
q11.answer: No! We don't take a percentage from your transactions ‚Äî 0% commission. You only pay for the plan, all sales revenue stays with you.

q12.question: How secure is data on LinkMAX?
q12.answer: We use SSL encryption, secure servers and comply with security standards. Your data and your customers' data is safe.

q13.question: Can I see examples of pages?
q13.answer: Yes! Our gallery features real user pages from different niches: barbers, photographers, trainers, psychologists, shops and more.

q14.question: How is LinkMAX better than Linktree and Taplink?
q14.answer: LinkMAX offers AI content generation, 0% sales commission, built-in CRM, gamification (achievements, quests) and modern design. Plus Russian and Kazakh language support.

linkInBio.title: What is Link-in-Bio and why do you need it?
linkInBio.subtitle: A link page is a mini-site that combines all your resources: social media, messengers, portfolio, products and services
linkInBio.p1: Link-in-Bio (multi-link, bio link) is a page you place in your Instagram, TikTok, YouTube or Telegram profile. Instead of one link, you get a full mini-landing with buttons, contacts and even a product catalog.
linkInBio.p2: LinkMAX is a modern Linktree and Taplink alternative with AI content generation. Choose your niche (barber, photographer, trainer, psychologist), and AI creates a ready page in 2 minutes with profile, blocks and texts.
linkInBio.p3: Unlike competitors, we don't take commission from your sales. All money from products and services is yours. Built-in analytics and CRM help understand which links work best.
linkInBio.keywords: Keywords: link page, bio link, link in bio, multilink, linktree alternative, taplink alternative, mini-landing
